File /std/room/punishments/fine.c

This is the method for fining someone in am. This handles keeping track fo the fines and the setup of fines. This punihshment needs to be inherited to work correctly.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Thu Sep 21 14:35:32 PDT 2000
